What version is installed and where?

An easy way to do this is to use pmtools.

Install pmtools

cpanm pmtools

What version of that module is installed?

$ pmvers Moo
2.003002

Where is that module installed?

$ pmpath Moo
/opt/perlbrew/libs/perl-5.26.0@mylib/lib/perl5/Moo.pm
